Supply Chain+Procurement+Supplier Sourci.KPIS: Number of new suppliers sourced per quarter.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Supplier Sourci.EXPLANATION: Measures the number of new suppliers sourced each quarter.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Supplier Sourci.FORMULA: Total Count of New Suppliers Sourced in a Quarter

Supply Chain+Procurement+Supplier Sourci.EXPLANATION: Measures the lead time for sourcing new suppliers.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Supplier Sourci.FORMULA: Average Time from Supplier Selection to Finalization of Agreements

Supply Chain+Procurement+Supplier Sourci.EXPLANATION: Measures the qualification rate of new suppliers.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Supplier Sourci.FORMULA: (Number of Qualified Suppliers / Total Number of Suppliers Evaluated) * 100

Supply Chain+Procurement+Supplier Sourci.KPIS: Cost savings achieved through new supplier sourcing.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Supplier Sourci.EXPLANATION: Measures the cost savings achieved through sourcing new suppliers.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Supplier Sourci.FORMULA: (Total Cost Savings from New Suppliers / Total Spend with New Suppliers) * 100

Supply Chain+Procurement+Supplier Sourci.KPIS: Supplier diversity index (percentage of diverse suppliers).
Supply Chain+Procurement+Supplier Sourci.EXPLANATION: Percentage of diverse suppliers in the total supplier base.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Supplier Sourci.FORMULA: (Number of Diverse Suppliers / Total Number of Suppliers) * 100

Supply Chain+Procurement+Supplier Sourci.KPIS: Supplier satisfaction score based on feedback surveys.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Supplier Sourci.EXPLANATION: Average score based on feedback surveys from suppliers regarding their satisfaction with the business relationship.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Supplier Sourci.FORMULA: Average Rating from Supplier Satisfaction Surveys

Supply Chain+Procurement+Supplier Sourci.KPIS: Percentage of suppliers meeting quality standards.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Supplier Sourci.EXPLANATION: Percentage of suppliers meeting predefined quality standards or metrics.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Supplier Sourci.FORMULA: (Number of Suppliers Meeting Quality Standards / Total Number of Suppliers Evaluated) * 100

Supply Chain+Procurement+Supplier Sourci.EXPLANATION: Score indicating the level of risk associated with each supplier, based on factors like financial stability, compliance history, and operational reliability.
Supply Chain+Procurement+Supplier Sourci.FORMULA: Average Risk Assessment Score from Supplier Evaluations
